p: To determine the immune status of sera against CHIKV, RRV, BFV, DENV, and ZIKV, commercially available ELISA systems were used and performed according to the manufacturerâ€™s protocol. The following ELISA systems were used: NovaLisa Chikungunya Virus IgG qualitative Capture ELISA; EuroImmun Anti-Chikungunya virus ELISA (IgM/IgG); EuroImmun Anti-Mayaro-Virus-ELISA (IgM/IgG); Panbio Barmah Forest Virus IgG/IgM ELISA; Panbio Ross River Virus IgM/IgG ELISA; the EuroImmun Anti-Zika Virus ELISA (IgG, IgM) and EuroImmun Anti-Dengue Virus ELISA (IgG, IgM).
